item.title: STI Writeup
item.description: STI 招新题WriteUP 背景 今年疫情情况不明，STI招新仅有一轮试题，故 基础题 T1

item.title: First, A New Start.
item.description: 又到了写博客的时间。(上次这么说似乎还是2017年😂) 距高中毕业不觉已有几个月，高考发挥并不理想的本菜鸡显然并没有成为京城人上人，只能在HUST继续水一水了🙄。 记得每周写写博客，记录学习进度，防止搞颓。 @颇具魔幻现实主义色彩的2020年

item.title: About
item.description: systemctl status seas0 ● seas0.service - Season (as a Coder) Daemon Loaded: loaded Active: active Tasks: Unknown Memory: Unknown sudo cat /etc/seas0.d/seas0.json { "currentStatus": "A HUSTer", "description": "A Former OIer", "todoList": [ "Caculus", "Linear Algebra", "OpenCV", "MATLAB", "CMake", "Python3", "Git", "x86 Assembly", "Verilog", "STM32", "FPGA", "etc" ] } $$ \KaTeX\ Support\ (like\ \LaTeX) $$
